NAME: $10,000 “No Essay” Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Easy scholarship open to all US-based high school, college, and graduate students

NAME: Nitro College Scholarship – No Essay
ELIGIBILITY: Easy scholarship open to all US-based high school, college, and graduate students

NAME: Niche $2,000 “No Essay” College Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Easy scholarship open to all US-based high school, college, and graduate students

NAME: Helen Lansdowne Resor Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Women and non binary post secondary students pursuing any creative field who wantss to work or intern at Wunderman Thompson

NAME: Automotive Women’s Alliance Foundation Education Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to female, North American citizens pursuing a career in the automotive, mobility, or related industries.

NAME: Taco Bell Live Más Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to students between 16 to 26 years old who submit a video (2 minutes or less in length) that addresses three questions about life.

NAME: DECA Student Scholarships
ELIGIBILITY: Open to college-bound high school or current college students who are DECA members.

NAME: Arthur W. Pense Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to New York residents who are enrolled in a degree program in physical or occupational therapy.

NAME: Lyons Aviation Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to aspiring pilots between the ages of 16 and 24 who will be available to complete pilot training within the next 6 months.

NAME: $25k “Be Bold” No-Essay Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Easy scholarship open to high school students, college students, community college students, and graduate students.

NAME: Helyn B. Reich Memorial Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to college students who are invovled with pro-Israel activities on their campus and are studying in Israel for at least 1 semester.

NAME: Margaret Mcnamara US-Canada Program
ELIGIBILITY: Women aged 25 and up who are nationals of a country on the MMEG eligibility list and are full-time college students in the U.S. or Canada.

NAME: Global Citizen Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to international or DACA students who will attend college at a U.S. or Canada college that MPOWER supports.

NAME: CareerFitter’s Annual Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to college and graduate students who write an essay about their perfect career.

NAME: F. Lammot Belin Arts Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to individuals planning to make their chosen fine art their life's work. Being from Pennsylvania is preferred, but not required.

NAME: MPOWER Women in STEM Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: International and DACA female students who wish to study in the U.S. or Canada and pursue a career in STEM, the medical field, or education.

NAME: AANAPISI Scholarship
ELIGIBILITY: Open to full-time, undergraduate, Asian or Pacific Islander students at AANAPISI Partner Institutions.
